case.name: VSAJ v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 162 (28 February 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: review of refugee review tribunal decision

citances.sentence: That section involves giving the applicant a "real and meaningful invitation to attend the hearing"; see SZEMS v MIMIA [2006] FCA 359 at [20] - [22] ; VSAJ v MIMIA [2006] FCA 162 at [17] - [20]; SYYB v MIMIA [2006] FCA 24 at [9] - [12].
